page.title: 04GOLFING - A Biography
page.content:
THE GREAT YARMOUTH AND CAISTER GOLF CLUB- 'THE OLDEST MEMBER'.
We interviwed 94 years-old Mr. Arthur England, who started playing 45 years ago,when he finished playing cricket and tennis. The membership and joining fees were then each Â£4(now Â£150+green fees)."There were lots of bushes on the course,but they had to be destroyed to get to the rabbits which had become diseased. The pavillion had been improved, especially the lounge and lockers(now 142).The course is never easy, but it is less difficult!" He won the Dredge cup for over 65's 3 times,but when the age was reduced to 50, he refused to enter-"He did not want to play with boys!." He said that more people played now than when he first started.
